experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant - Consumer Behavior
experience.description: Conducted extensive quantitative research on digital consumer purchasing paths, utilizing statistical software to identify key drivers in brand loyalty. Synthesized academic literature to support hypotheses on market segmentation and emerging social media trends.

experience.title: Market Research Project Lead
experience.description: Led a comprehensive field study analyzing local retail competition and consumer sentiment. Designed and deployed primary survey instruments, processed raw data to identify market gaps, and presented data-driven recommendations for brand positioning.

metadata.experience_level: Relevant research done for the job field.
